009package Ch21_GeometricOperations;
010
011import ij.ImagePlus;
012import ij.gui.GenericDialog;
013import ij.plugin.filter.PlugInFilter;
014import ij.process.ImageProcessor;
015import imagingbook.common.geometry.mappings.linear.AffineMapping2D;
016import imagingbook.common.geometry.mappings.linear.Rotation2D;
017import imagingbook.common.geometry.mappings.linear.Translation2D;
018import imagingbook.common.ij.DialogUtils;
019import imagingbook.common.ij.IjUtils;
020import imagingbook.common.image.ImageMapper;
021import imagingbook.common.image.OutOfBoundsStrategy;
022import imagingbook.common.image.interpolation.InterpolationMethod;
023import imagingbook.sampleimages.GeneralSampleImage;
024
025/**
026 * <p>
027 * ImageJ plugin, rotates the current image by a specified angle around its
028 * center. See Sec. 21.1.1 of [1] for details. Optionally opens a 
029 * sample image if no image is currently open.
030 * </p>
031 * <p>
032 * [1] W. Burger, M.J. Burge, <em>Digital Image Processing &ndash; An
033 * Algorithmic Introduction</em>, 3rd ed, Springer (2022).
034 * </p>
035 * 
036 * @author WB
037 * @version 2022/11/28
038 * 
039 * @see ImageMapper
040 * @see Rotation2D
041 */
042public class Map_Linear_Rotate_Center implements PlugInFilter {
043        
044        private static double alphaDeg = 15.0;  // rotation angle (in degrees)
045        
046        private static OutOfBoundsStrategy OBS = OutOfBoundsStrategy.ZeroValues;
047        private static InterpolationMethod IPM = InterpolationMethod.Bicubic;
048        
049        /**
050         * Constructor, asks to open a predefined sample image if no other image
051         * is currently open.
052         */
053        public Map_Linear_Rotate_Center() {
054                if (IjUtils.noCurrentImage()) {
055                        DialogUtils.askForSampleImage(GeneralSampleImage.Clown);
056                }
057        }
058
059        @Override
060    public int setup(String arg, ImagePlus im) {
061        return DOES_ALL;
062    }
063
064        @Override
065    public void run(ImageProcessor ip) {
066                
067                if (!runDialog()) {
068                        return;
069                }
070                
071                double alpha =  Math.toRadians(alphaDeg);
072                double xc = 0.5 * ip.getWidth();
073                double yc = 0.5 * ip.getHeight();
074                
075                AffineMapping2D T1 = new Translation2D(-xc, -yc);
076                AffineMapping2D R  = new Rotation2D(alpha);
077                AffineMapping2D T2 = new Translation2D(xc, yc);
078                AffineMapping2D A  = T1.concat(R).concat(T2);
079                
080                AffineMapping2D iA = A.getInverse();    // inverse mapping (target to source)
081                new ImageMapper(iA, OBS, IPM).map(ip);
082    }
083        
084        // --------------------------------------------
085        
086        private boolean runDialog() {
087                GenericDialog gd = new GenericDialog(this.getClass().getSimpleName());
088                
089                gd.addNumericField("Rotation angle (deg)", alphaDeg, 1);
090                gd.addEnumChoice("Image out-of-bounds strategy", OBS);
091                gd.addEnumChoice("Pixel interpolation method", IPM);
092                
093                gd.showDialog();
094                if (gd.wasCanceled())
095                        return false;
096                
097                alphaDeg = gd.getNextNumber();
098                OBS = gd.getNextEnumChoice(OutOfBoundsStrategy.class);
099                IPM = gd.getNextEnumChoice(InterpolationMethod.class);
100                
101                return true;
102        }
103}
